title: Rainshower
creator_credit: Dimension Films, Edward Schuman and Michael Murphy
brief_description: Presents without commentary the sights, sounds beauty and rhythm of rain. Shows how a rainshower affects the plants and animals on a farm, as well as the people in a community.
